description: This will install the specified Nessus Agent on a Windows machine

installfilepath.description: The file name and location used to install agent.  Requires a full path to the file.

key.description: The cloud link key for Tenable.

nessus_group.description: The Tenable Host Group to which the agents should be added

nessus_name.description: An optional name to pass to your Temable instance for the node on which the agent is being installed

nessus_server.description: The hostname:port information for the Tenable instance to which you want to link the agent.
